meta.description: With over 20 years of experience, we deliver the highest quality concrete cutting services for residential and commercial projects.

pageHeader.title: Our Concrete Cutting Services
pageHeader.subtitle: Professional concrete cutting solutions for residential and commercial projects

services.title: Core Drilling
services.description: Bayani Concrete Cutting provides precise core drilling services for a wide range of applications. Our state-of-the-art equipment enables us to create clean, accurate holes in concrete with minimal noise and dust. We can drill holes from 1/2 inch to 36 inches in diameter through concrete floors, walls, and ceilings for various utility penetrations.

services.title: Wall Sawing
services.description: Wall sawing, also known as track sawing, is a technique used to create precise openings in concrete walls, floors, and ceilings. Our hydraulic wall saws can cut through reinforced concrete up to 24 inches thick. This method is ideal for creating clean, straight cuts with minimal vibration and disruption to the surrounding structure.

services.title: Slab Sawing
services.description: Slab sawing (flat sawing) is used for horizontal cutting of concrete slabs, bridge decks, and pavements. Our powerful flat saws can cut through reinforced concrete up to 24 inches deep with high precision. This technique is essential for creating expansion joints, removing damaged sections, or preparing areas for new construction.

services.title: Wire Sawing
services.description: Wire sawing is an advanced technique used for cutting through heavily reinforced concrete structures of any size or thickness. This method uses a diamond-impregnated wire that can access areas where traditional saws cannot reach. Perfect for large-scale removals and complex structures, our wire sawing service provides clean cuts with minimal vibration.

services.title: Concrete Removal
services.description: Bayani Concrete Cutting provides efficient concrete removal services for various renovation and construction projects. Our team expertly removes concrete slabs, walls, foundations, and other structures while minimizing disruption. We combine our cutting techniques with specialized equipment to safely remove concrete sections after cutting.

cta.heading: Need Expert Concrete Cutting Services?
cta.text: Whatever your concrete cutting requirements, Bayani Concrete Cutting has the expertise, equipment, and experience to deliver exceptional results. Contact us today to discuss your project and receive a free, no-obligation quote.
